name: Shoot the BMBR by FeCO
description:
##############################

 BASIC 10 Liners Contest 2021

      SHOOT the BMBR

Commodore BASIC V3.5 release

programmed and

final mods with Yape    

written by: FeCO

##############################

INSTRUCTIONS:

63 bombers flying to the city.

You have to shoot the bombers or they will be destroy the city. 

If you can shoot the 20th jet, your weapon will be upgraded to a

stronger one, but beware, you have only one chance. If you can

shoot the last fast jet, you can try a prototype weapon.

Good luck!

In the beginning, you have to choose the level (1-3), by press the numbers. 1 hard - 3 easy.

It means, you have same amount of ammo as the enemy planes in hard mode, 2x and 3x more when you choose the other options.  

On the top left corner on the screen there will be 3 gray rows. first indicated te status of the mission, second the ammo amount, third row shows the success of your shooting. 

Recommended emulator:  YAPE

CONTROLS:

SPACE: Shoot

at the end: "Y" key restarts the game, others exit.

CODE DESCRIPTIONS:

0: Set the level

1: Put the stars

2: Status rows and plane datas

3: Plane data and shooting path 

4: Set the mission

5: Let fly the jets 

6: Shoot

7: Target destroyed

8: Set flying speed, and the fast jet

9: Final controls, and ranking
